Coming standard with the balance of its 5 Years or 90 000km Service plan and 3 Years or 100 000km Warranty. The 2019 Mitsubishi Pajero Sport is by far the most sort after SUV on the market. With better ground clearance and a higher stance, the Pajero Sport definitely looks more ready to get down and dirty than any SUV. The Mitsubishi Pajero Sport is a rugged wagon that is very good off road but comfortable – and easy to drive – on the road.
